alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 3:11AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Elevated Fire Weather Conditions through this Evening... South to southeast winds will gust up to 40 mph starting late this morning and continue through the afternoon and evening hours. The combination of gusty winds, warm temperatures, relative humidities in the 40 to 50 percent range, and cured agricultural fields will lead to very high fire danger levels. If a fire were to ignite in this environment, it would spread quickly and be difficult to control. Outdoor burning is strongly discouraged and farmers are urged to use extra caution during harvest activities. Gusty winds may also blow around unsecured objects, such as Halloween decorations, and make driving high profile vehicles difficult.
